data.text: @LufcColin @runsfordad @chestermarathon Thanks Col, yes I get a huge buzz at the finish line. I think my favourite part is encouraging everyone around me, faster and slower! The support amongst all runners is incredible. If life was like a Marathon, the world would be a better place, everyone supporting one another

@LufcColin @runsfordad @chestermarathon Col thanks so much, I am amongst very esteemed company on this journey, there are some phenomenal runners, yourself included. I hope that’s what makes my journey all the more shocking when my friend finds out.. I still can’t believe it, let alone what he will make of it all 😆
@LufcColin @runsfordad @chestermarathon That’s high praise from you Col, I don’t feel like I deserve it! My times wouldn’t win any prizes, I will never be a quick runner!
@runsfordad @chestermarathon @RunEnglishHalf I’ve got 6 more before end of year and possibly 2 more I want to do
@BriShaw81 @chestermarathon @RunEnglishHalf That's fab!! Running is a funny old thing isn't it. Can't believe how fast these races are coming round.
@LufcColin @runsfordad @chestermarathon Well done Col, you’re comeback is very impressive. Keep up the amazing work
@BriShaw81 @chestermarathon Great idea, I'll do that!! How's your leg?
@BriShaw81 @chestermarathon Yes tomorrow! 18. See how I go. Heard chocolate and cake is a good cure 😆
@LufcColin @chestermarathon Wow!! For how long you had to rest for is a testament to your fitness to be able to do that. Just brilliant!!
@chilliboy70 @chestermarathon Thanks John!! Better had after all this effort 😂
@FishmanMCFC @chestermarathon Thanks - that's what I keep telling myself after initially moping 😐
@LufcColin @chestermarathon Thanks Col. How are you getting on?
@BriShaw81 @chestermarathon It's an easier decision when I know I could mess it all up haha
@runsfordad @chestermarathon Take in easy. Don't mess up all your hard work now. Fitness will stay with a few days off👍
@runsfordad @chestermarathon Best thing to do, treat this week as a mini taper week 👍

@chilliboy70 @chestermarathon Thanks John. Felt a bit rubbish at first but tbh this is my first ever niggle that's stopped me running so can't complain. Doesn't feel as bad today so taking that as a positive! See how the next few days go.

@runsfordad @chestermarathon Sounds like a good plan Sam. You've got a great foundation from the last 15 weeks or so. Unbelievable commitment to the plan. A niggle may escalate if you carry on. See how rests goes and get it checked properly if it isn't getting better soon. Can't wait to see your result👍👍
@DarrenRedmond75 @chestermarathon Thank you! Ha ha I'll watch out for that one, don't want to heckle people for nothing 😉

@runsfordad @chestermarathon Well you've hit 20miles more times than me so you're doing ace, just keep at it. I've done Chester once before and it was a great event.  Although I did get confused when it merged with the metric marathon at about 18miles as I thought people were cheating 😂😂
@matthewricardo3 @chestermarathon Hope so!! Fingers crossed
@DarrenRedmond75 @chestermarathon Wow!! Amazing. Super super fast. I've done two 20 milers so far but still feel quite out of my depth 😂

@runsfordad @chestermarathon When I signed up for it I was hoping that my London training this year would help me get that elusive sub3hrs, hasn't worked out that way though.... I did 21miles yesterday and that felt stupidly hard so who knows. Ask me again in 4 weeks 😀
@runsfordad @chestermarathon Very sensible Sam , no need to push it . Xx
@DarrenRedmond75 @chestermarathon With how my foot feels currently just to genuinely finish!!! But under 4:20 was the goal prior to this, after obviously...just finish my first one 😂 You?
@runsfordad @chestermarathon Like all training plans really, it could be going better! You got any goals in mind for Chester?
@DarrenRedmond75 @chestermarathon Ah great, how are you getting on with the training?
@runsfordad @chestermarathon Rest is always wise as those niggles can escalate quickly! I'm doing Chester as well this year 👍
